concept.title: Getting Started
concept.shortdesc: This section helps you get started using your Eucalyptus cloud, including an overview of the features available to end users, how to sign up for an account, get credentials, and set the environment variables that enable you to interact with Eucalyptus.

conbody.p: As a cloud user, you can access the Eucalyptus cloud using a command line interface such as Euca2ools, or using a web-based interface such as the Eucalyptus User Console. You can switch between them freely. What you create in one will be accessible through the other.
To access Eualyptus, you need keys for Euca2ools and a password for the User Console. To request access, talk to your cloud administrator.
